# [Interview #627: NY ComicCon Report - Ted Herman, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=627#5)

#### Ted Herman

Was Norla in the Kin and where did she get her paralis-net?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.

#### Footnote

Norla is the 'toothless wilder' in the Black Hills from who Cadsuane earned her hair ornament
*ter'angreal*
[WH34, COT23].
